Reviews.Title: Awesome system
Reviews.Author: K. Streett
Reviews.Content: Great value for the price - high quality.Easy to install and easy to operate - smaller size DVR is easy to conceal if desired

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: Jay McMillin
Reviews.Content: I Did a lot of checking around before I purchased this item. It is pretty cut and dry. It showed up a bit earlier than stated and was complete in package. It took me about 2 hours to run wire and install cameras. Everything works like advertised...I am completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: great product and not cost much at all
Reviews.Author: Timberland Pham
Reviews.Content: I have purchased at least 6 systems already and none have give me the issue, good quality although all the cable  should have made in 100ft instead of 60ft.

Reviews.Title: Ezoomtek and Zmodo - buy at your owm risk
Reviews.Author: Sharon P. Benwarisingh
Reviews.Content: I bought a Zmodo security system from Ezoomtek and the hard drive crashed after less than 3 months and I cannot get any help from Ezoomtek or Amazon. Do not buy anything from Ezoomtek

Reviews.Title: Great Company
Reviews.Author: ridley augustin
Reviews.Content: I'm take back what said earlier, even though they were not at fault I took my frustration out on this company.  But they still reach out to me and apologized . I thank them for that.  And though I was rude and angry they still decided to send me another...Once again I thank you
